VN - Release Notes

Version 3.2.0 (14.09.09)
  The internal automata editor replaces the external invocation of JFLAP.

Version 3.1.1 (04.09.09)
  Erigone Version 2 is added to the archives, but the VN software is unchanged.

Version 3.1 (10.07.09)
  Final release of Erigone-based software.

Version 3.0 (24.05.09)
  Interim release of Erigone-based software.
